abstract: TIP OF THE WEEK: If you spend a lot of time looking up locations around the United States on map sites, the Map+ add-on for the Firefox browser can save time. Once you install Map+ (available at https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/2394), you can highlight an address on a Web page and right-click on it to see a small Yahoo map of the location pop up in the Firefox window. J. D. BIERSDORFER
lead_paragraph: TIP OF THE WEEK: If you spend a lot of time looking up locations around the United States on map sites, the Map+ add-on for the Firefox browser can save time. headline.main: Tip of the Week: Speed Your Online Mapping
